item.description:
Hi WingPeeps-

This looks like a pretty slamming event and huge turnout expected. See you there. - Sandra

*******

CT Science center is turning 2! Come party with us. This time your favorite 21+ party is moving to FRIDAY NIGHT!

Wear your favorite party gear and celebrate the Science Center’s 2nd birthday, Liquid Lounge style!

• DJ John Rzasa is back! Boogie to your favorite #2 dance hits.
...• Jamie’s Junk Show Band plays groovy acoustic Rock, Reggae, and Jazz
• Two-step with Country 92.5’s favorite, DJ John Cadillac Saville.
• Sea Tea Improv brings you twice the laughs and spins your weirdest thoughts into the act
• Get cozy with live animals in the Liquid Lounge Petting Zoo – 2 hedgehogs, 2 rabbits, 2 white tree frogs, 2 bearded dragons, 2 turtles
• Free chair massages, courtesy of GLO Spa
• Classic birthday party entertainment including face painting and balloon art. (no clowns, we promise)
• Live Science
• Surprise personalities - maybe even your favorite super-heroes

Tickets: $10 if purchased online by June 9 at www.CTScienceCenter.org/Liquid
$15 at the door; $10 for Science Center Members

As always, 1000+ friends, liquid delights (featuring the “Birthday Suit Shot”), 150+ exhibits including the new summer exhibit Nature Unleashed: Inside Natural Disasters. Normal parking rate apply. Garage open until midnight.

This is a 21+ event.

Sponsored by: The Greater Hartford Arts Council, The Hartford Advocate, Hartford Distributors Inc., Kiss 95.7, Marriott Hartford Downtown, and YP.com
item.how_to_find_us: I will email Yes RSVPs my cell phone number day before or day of event.
item.name: Fri 6/10: Liquid Lounge @ CT Science Center
